TSNTPSend.GetNTP
TSNTPSend     

function GetNTP: Boolean;

Unit
SNTPsend

Description
Send request to SntpHost and wait for reply. If all OK, result is true and NTPReply and NTPTime are valid.

Result time is after alll corrections.


See also:
GetBroadcastNTP, GetSNTP, MaxSyncDiff, NTPDelay, NTPOffset, NTPReply, NTPTime, SyncTime
